0.step: Ανακατέψτε τα αυγά και καρυκεύστε τα καλά με αλάτι και πιπέρι.

1.step: Ζεστάνετε το λάδι και το βούτυρο σε ένα αντικολλητικό τηγάνι πάνω σε μέτρια-χαμηλή φωτιά

2.step: Αφού λιώσει το βούτυρο, ρίξε τα αυγά στο τηγάνι και γείρετε το ώστε να καλυφθεί η επιφάνεια του τηγανιού

steps: Season the beaten eggs well with salt and pepper. Heat the oil and butter in a non-stick frying pan over a medium-low heat until the butter has melted and is foaming

Pour the eggs into the pan, tilt the pan ever so slightly from one side to another to allow the eggs to swirl and cover the surface of the pan completely. Cook for about 20 seconds then scrape a line through the middle with a spatula
Tilt the pan again to allow it to fill back up with the runny egg. Repeat once or twice more until the egg has just set

Now you can fill the omelette with whatever you like – some grated cheese or smoked salmon all work well. Scatter the filling over the top of the omelette and fold gently in half with the spatula. Slide onto a plate to serve.
